definition: by no means an isolated case/numerous
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: And rituals can be repetitive - although the frequency of repetition varies enormously.
sentences.chinese: 儀式也有反覆性，儘管其反覆的頻率不一而足。

sentences.english: They ranged in size from small handguns to powerful sniper rifles.
sentences.chinese: 其尺寸小至手槍，大至狙擊槍，不一而足。

sentences.english: The recent economic downturn has come about due to many different factors.
sentences.chinese: 近期是經濟低迷時期，若要追根溯源，更是不一而足。

sentences.english: The official study of south of the Yangtze River in Qing Dynasty adopts different forms of landtax.
sentences.chinese: 清代江南官學學田所採用的地租形態不一而足。

sentences.english: Gong Yuzhi's analysis has inserted heavy influence on the academic circle of Party history. It received various comments and responses.
sentences.chinese: 該觀點在黨史學界頗有影響，對它的評價也不一而足。

sentences.english: The responses varied from serious to the light hearted.
sentences.chinese: 收到的答案從嚴肅到詼諧，不一而足。

definition: things like this (idiom); and so on/and the rest/etc
names of many kinds (idiom); items of every description
too numerous to mention individually or one by one
so much so that/to the extent that/even
none lacking/none missing/everything is there/everyone without exception
